Auckland Harbour Bridge reopens after police incident, southbound traffic delays remain https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-incident-on-auckland-harbour-bridge-closes-lane-causes-southbound-traffic-delays/PE3BGJBTVNF27O4NTKA2GG7EY4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-incident-on-auckland-harbour-bridge-closes-lane-causes-southbound-traffic-delays/PE3BGJBTVNF27O4NTKA2GG7EY4/ Southbound traffic is backed up from the Harbour to Northcote Rd.Tue, 17 Dec 2024 04:16:55 +0000 A southbound lane on Auckland’s Harbour Bridge has reopened following a police incident that has caused traffic delays.
